    • movieShowtimeEnd

      public void movieShowtimeEnd(int movieID)
      Description copied from interface: IShowtimeSystem
      When a movie status changes to "End of Showing" invoke this method to update all movie entires in showtime to stop booking for a showtime. Pass in the movieID which status has changed, Manager will set all showtimes with that MovieID to "End of Showing"
      Specified by:
      movieShowtimeEnd in interface IShowtimeSystem
